title: Person of Interest: John Reese vs SP-9 Members
author: Joseph Bennet
comment: This was one of the best shows ever.

One of several times in the shows run where John is shown to either be an  ambidextrous shooter or at the very least highly competant at shooting with his non-dominant hand. I've rewatched POI more than most of the shows in my top 5 and it's amazing to me how much high concept detail they layered into the early seasons when it still carried the veneer or a weekly case of the week style show.
I don't know who's better? John Reese (Person of Interest) or Michael Westen (Burn Notice)? They're both badass characters with great teams!
Ramin Djawadi's work in this show is underrated
What if the POI team came to this judge when Sgt Carter needed a subpoena against HR instead of the crooked judge who set her up?
